welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wad Medani, Sudan! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of this bustling city, known for its vibrant markets, beautiful Nile River views, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Wad Medani has to offer.
